July 2, 2020 Reopening Your Restaurant: What You Need to Know <#ReopeningYourRestaurant> Reminder: Fulfillment Orders on Independence Day – July 3, 2020 <#ReminderFulfillmentOrders> Get Ready for New and Improved Technical Training Courses <#NewImprovedCourses> Train at Your Own Pace <#TrainAtYourOwnPace> Reopening Your Restaurant: What You Need to Know As some markets are loosening restrictions for restaurants to reopen, we’ve created a series on NCR.com titled, “Reopening Your Restaurant: What You Need to Know” <[[https://www.ncr.com/blogs/restaurants/reopening-your-restaurant-what-you-need-to-know]]> to help operators navigate this new way of operating during the pandemic. We’ve compiled some practical, helpful guidance, and considerations on various topics ranging from evaluating finances to renegotiating leases to deep cleaning best practices and much more.
Reminder: Fulfillment Orders on Independence Day – July 3, 2020 Friday, July 3, 2020 is Independence Day, a U.S. national holiday observed by NCR and our logistics provider. It is not considered a business day, so all orders will be fulfilled as listed below. The cut off time for all orders is 6:00 p.m. ET.
• Next Calendar Day (NCD) service level orders are not affected by the holiday. These orders will be shipped the same day as ordered and delivered the following day. • Next Business Day (NBD) service level orders will be fulfilled on the next business day following the holiday. • Next Flight Out (NFO) service level orders will be available every day, including Friday, July 3rd and Saturday, July 4th. Get Ready for New and Improved Technical Training Courses The NCR training calendar <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rq/ek/va/virtual technical training.pdf]]> for the third quarter includes information on specific dates/times for each offering, course details, and registration information. Technicians must register in advance via NCRU <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]> to attend these sessions and receive credit for participation. For additional questions concerning the calendar or NCRU, <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]> email hospitailitytraining@ncr.com <[[mailto:hospitailitytraining@ncr.com]]> ${CTA2Text} <[[${CTA2URL}?${url-parameter}]]> Train at Your Own Pace Are you too busy to attend one of the live virtual classes? No Worries. We’ve got you covered. Most virtual coursework is also available as self-paced content that’s accessible 24/7 on NCRU <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]>. To locate a curriculum, simply enter the curriculum number into the search bar in NCRU. <[[https://ncr.csod.com/client/ncr/default2.aspx]]> Some of our most popular self-paced courses include:
• Aloha Takeout Self-Paced - CURR82319 • Aloha Online Ordering Self-Paced - CURR82393 • Aloha Kitchen Self-Paced - CURR82314
Still need help? Email us at: hospitailitytraining@ncr.com <[[mailto:hospitailitytraining@ncr.com]]>
